question:
In light of Pakistan suspending the exchange of postal mails, consider the following statements about Universal Postal Union:
  1. It is an arm of the WTO.
  2. It is the oldest international organisation in the world.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Universal Postal Union is a specialised arm of the United Nations. All UN members can become UPU members but require the approval of 2/3rd of the current UPU members. Only a few countries like Marshall Islands and Micronesia are non-members. Statement 2 is incorrect: It is the third oldest international organisation after the Rhine Commission and the International Telecommunication Union. It was established in 1874 and became a part of the UN in 1948. It was established by the Treaty of Bern. It is headquartered in Bern, Switzerland.
